name: RST Awesome Team Widget
author: Sumon Reja

sections.description:
RST Awesome Team Widget is an elementor add-on to showcase your Team widget style/Designe
This plugin is responsive and has 10 layouts inside the plugin.This plugin can be easily used by a user by drag and drop.

Each section of this plugin can be easily changed by a user

This Team Widget Plugin is 100% customizable easily. You can summon the Team widget onto any page on which you need to showcase RST Awesome Team Widget or grid view. It offers 10 variations of the Team layouts.

You also get to customize the Widget’ fields, style, color, and general appearance. With this WordPress RST Awesome Team Widget plugin, you can control whether the Team images on the Widget you display are square or rounded. The RST Awesome Team Widget.

We will update this plugin in the future so that a user can get everything he needs from this plugin.

How to install This Plugin

If a few days i will upload a vide on how to install this plugin and how it works properly
I hope you can easily install this plugin by watching this video
sections.faq:
How to use RST Awesome Team Widget

install this plugin from wordpress.org, then which page you want to show this RST Asesome Team widget,Open Page With Elementor > Search Awesome then drag and drop in your elementor section

Can you add multiple Team Member Style ?

Yes you can add multiple team member style in your theme

Can I use RST Awesome Team Widget with any theme ?

Yes you can use this widget with any theme it will work. If you face any problem about this plugin then contact with below mail. we will try to response with in short time.

Is this Team Widget work with multisite ?

Yes this Team Widget work with multi-site.

Is this Team Widget support Multilanguage?

Yes this Team Widget support Multi language

Do I need to have coding skills to use RST Awesome Team Widget ?

No. You donâ€™t need any coding skills. With just a few clicks, you can amazingly create unlimited team members showcases.

Need any help about This Plugin ?

please mail us to : eng.sumonrejata@gmail.com
